Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.pto

Interface PTORequestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PTORequestServiceImpl
public interface PTORequestService
This interface defines the services related to PTORequest management in Buffett Inc.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

      Creates or updates a PTORequest.

      Returns:
      the created or updated PTORequest.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date.
      endDate - the end date.
      Returns:
      a list of all PTORequests between the two dates.

    • getAllPTORequestsByStatus

      List<PTORequest> getAllPTORequestsByStatus(PTOStatus status)
      Fetches all PTORequests by status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status of the PTORequests to be fetched.
      Returns:
      a list of all PTORequests with the specified status.
